name: Space Head
description:
A crazy space runner !

Your head launched itself into space, try to keep it alive by replenishing blood, while avoiding meteors and aliens by shooting blood lasers with your eyes. Try to reach the boss, and beat your highscore !

This game is a school project, a 1 week game jam, my first one in a team of 4 !

Please let me know what's your best scores in the comment section !

CONTROLS :

MOVE : UP & DOWN ARROWS

SHOOT : SPACEBAR
